publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-5869 Pauline McNeill: BBC Asian Network and BBC 6 Music—That the Parliament notes that the BBC’s first public purpose is to "represent the different nations, regions and communities to the rest of the UK"; believes that the BBC Asian Network plays an important role in fostering cross-community cohesion; further believes that BBC 6 Music plays an important role in the development of Scotland’s contemporary cultural output and provides a platform for new and innovative artists, and calls on the BBC Trust to review its proposals to close down the BBC Asian Network and BBC 6 Music.

S3M-5869 BBC Asian Network and BBC 6 Music (lodged on 2 March 2010) Jack McConnell*, Marlyn Glen*, Patricia Ferguson*, Robin Harper*, Patrick Harvie*, Jackie Baillie*, John Park*, Trish Godman*, Cathy Peattie*, Elaine Smith*, Rhona Brankin*, Irene Oldfather*, Elaine Murray*, Marilyn Livingstone*
